query.statement: SELECT MANDT, USERNUMB FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF WHERE MANDT = '183' AND USERNUMB = CAST( ( SELECT CASE WHEN USERNUMB = '' THEN ( CASE WHEN REGDPT = 'R' THEN (SELECT MAX(USERNUMB)+1 FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF WHERE MANDT = '183' AND USERNUMB LIKE '80%') WHEN REGDPT = 'B' THEN (SELECT MAX(USERNUMB)+1 FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF WHERE MANDT = '183' AND USERNUMB LIKE '900%') ELSE (SELECT MAX(USERNUMB)+1 FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF WHERE MANDT = '183' AND USERNUMB LIKE '70%') END ) ELSE USERNUMB END FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF_REQ WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND USERNAME = #USERNAME# AND USERMAIL = #USERMAIL# AND SEQ_NO = #SEQ_NO# ) AS VARCHAR(10)) FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
